page.title: 01OVERVIEW of MANGOTSFIELD
page.content:
Parishes of{Mangotsfield}Urban and Rural, with parts of{Winterbourne {Down,Westerleigh and Kendleshire. Cut in half by the{M4}running east to north-west of the area, it is largely dormitory suburb in the west and agricultural land in the east. {The 'DOWNS'}end here with pretty hilly countryside near Moorend and Bury Hill, and flatter fields _ some low lying to the east near the Folly Brook.
{Bristol City}boundary clips the {Frenchay}corner and the{Fromeside {Walkway}twists north through to {Winterbourne. Most workers travel out as work in the area is largely service based. Property varies from council house estates to very expensive country houses.
